mapper.select: SELECT e_book_num, e_book_title, e_book_writer, e_book_date, e_book_info, e_book_index, e_book_img_path, e_book_tag FROM E_BOOK WHERE E_BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or E_BOOK_WRITER LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or E_BOOK_INFO LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or E_BOOK_INDEX LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or E_BOOK_TAG LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' order by E_BOOk_NUM DESC;
